author: Kaidian
title: Ah, the Fire Unit I
review:
I remember this little set from when I was a kid.  It was my first Fire-themed Town set and first Fire Fighter mini-figure.  The figure got hours and hours of play, but the car....not so much.  The problem is, as you can see from the picture, the mini-figure does not fit anywhere within the car!  I remember reconfiguring the pieces so I could sit the guy in it, but then it still looked weird.

 

The number of pieces was terribly small, but for the price I'm sure my folks paid for the set, it was well worth it.  The only other problem the set had was the stickers for the side of the car. You couldn't take the plates apart because the stickers covered the sides.  I think I finally broke down and just ripped the stickers off so I could use the red plates in something else I was creating.

 

Overall, I give this a "BB" rating. (Two Brick)
